attributes.action: All government MPs, PM etc.. to be paid the national average wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government PM, MPs, EMPs etc.. were paid the national average wage, then we would see only the people who want to do good for the country coming into politics and not people coming into politics to rip off the tax payer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
